metadata.title: USN-5795-1 -- Net-SNMP vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Net-SNMP incorrectly handled certain requests. A remote attacker could possibly use these issues to cause Net-SNMP to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5795-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnetsnmptrapd40 - 5.9.1+dfsg-1ubuntu2.4 libsnmp40 - 5.9.1+dfsg-1ubuntu2.4 snmptrapd - 5.9.1+dfsg-1ubuntu2.4 libsnmp-dev - 5.9.1+dfsg-1ubuntu2.4 libsnmp-base - 5.9.1+dfsg-1ubuntu2.4 snmp - 5.9.1+dfsg-1ubuntu2.4 libsnmp-perl - 5.9.1+dfsg-1ubuntu2.4 tkmib - 5.9.1+dfsg-1ubuntu2.4 snmpd - 5.9.1+dfsg-1ubuntu2.4 No subscription required
